com.ikaver.aagarwal.ds.hw1.shared

Interface INodeManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NodeManagerImpl

    public interface INodeManager
extends java.rmi.Remote
    A Node Manager is a ???master??? node that manages other nodes of the system. The Node Manager can ask its slave nodes (which we call Process Runners) to launch and terminate processes. Additionally, it can request a slave node to suspend a process, serialize it and send it through the network and afterwards forward the serialized process to a different node to resume its execution.

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds a process runner with the given connection string to the set of "available process runners".
      java.util.List<ProcessRunnerState> getProcessRunnerState()
      Returns a list of the states of all the currently available process runners.
      int launch(java.lang.String className, java.lang.String[] args)
      Launches the process with the given class name and arguments in one of the available process runners.
      boolean migrate(int pid, java.lang.String srcProcessRunner, java.lang.String destProcessRunner)
      Migrates the process with the given pid from the process runner with id srcProcessRunner to the process runner with id destProcessRunner
      boolean remove(int pid)
      Terminates the process with the given pid

    • Method Detail

      • addProcessRunner

        java.lang.String addProcessRunner(java.lang.String connectionString)
                                  throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Adds a process runner with the given connection string to the set of "available process runners".
        Parameters:
        connectionString - the socket address for the process runner
        Returns:
        The process runner id if the node was added successfully, else null
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • launch

        int launch(java.lang.String className,
         java.lang.String[] args)
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Launches the process with the given class name and arguments in one of the available process runners.
        Parameters:
        className - The full class name of the process to run.
        args - The arguments for the process
        Returns:
        The process id > 0 if the process was launched successfully, else it returns -1.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • migrate

        boolean migrate(int pid,
              java.lang.String srcProcessRunner,
              java.lang.String destProcessRunner)
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Migrates the process with the given pid from the process runner with id srcProcessRunner to the process runner with id destProcessRunner
        Parameters:
        pid - The pid of the process
        srcProcessRunner - The process runner currently running the process
        destProcessRunner - The process runner that will continue running the process
        Returns:
        true iff successful.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • remove

        boolean remove(int pid)
               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Terminates the process with the given pid
        Parameters:
        pid - The pid of the process that will be terminated
        Returns:
        true iff successful
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

                                                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Returns a list of the states of all the currently available process runners.

        The list of the states of all the currently available process runners.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
